name: Roasted Roma Tomatoes
author: WendyWendy
summary: Simple, fresh ingredients that are amazing together. Roast tomatoes in the oven or on your grill; you want them cooked but still firm, definitely not mushy.
ingredients: 8  roma (plum) tomatoes, cut in half and seeds removed
salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Mix together the tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, parsley, basil, oregano, and salt and pepper in a bowl, working the seasonings into the cavities of the tomatoes
Place the tomatoes, cut sides up, on a baking sheet, and sprinkle each tomato with about 1 tablespoon of feta cheese
Bake the tomatoes in the preheated oven until cooked but still firm, about 15 minutes
